border-width.comment: No border by default for fieldset

padding.comment: No padding by default for fieldset

margin.comment: No margin by default for fieldset

gap.comment: Space between radio options in the group

font-family.comment: Font family for the legend (reuses form field label)

font-size.comment: Font size for the legend (reuses form field label)

font-weight.comment: Font weight for the legend (reuses form field label)

line-height.comment: Line height for the legend (reuses form field label)

color.comment: Text color for the legend (reuses form field label)

margin-block-end.comment: Space below the legend before the radio options (uses smaller margin like when description follows)
